name: The Magical Forest (FarBear)
description:
The Magical Forest is a simple learning game that was made to help kids learn Hebrew.

In this game the player's mission is to cleanse the magical forest from a dark curse.
To complete the mission the player will need to find the hidden words throughout the forest and complete the story so that the forest could heal.

The game features a complete voice over of the story.

Can only be played in the Hebrew language, Made as a freelance project.
